transparentPAC:
Standard Squid Port Standard Proxy Port
DMZ Network Remote Sites Stephen's Green Trim HQ APN Devices Old LAN
dstdomain src browser localport
http://www.squid-cache.org/Doc/config/acl/ Fast ACLs include (as of squid 3.1.0.7):
all (built-in) src dstdomain browser localport dstdom_regex arp peername time url_regex urlpath_regex method req_header
